TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Installer extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供自訂安裝的基礎。

span.span: Provides the foundation for custom installations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是.NET Framework 中的所有自訂安裝程式的基底類別。This is the base class for all custom installers in the .NET Framework. 安裝程式會協助在電腦上安裝應用程式的元件。Installers are components that help install applications on a computer. 有幾個步驟，您必須遵循使用:There are several steps you must follow to use an : - 繼承類別。Inherit the class. - 覆寫， ， ，和方法。Override the , , , and methods. - 新增至您的衍生類別，並將它設定為`true`。Add the to your derived class and set it to `true`. - 將您的衍生的類別放在具有您要安裝的應用程式的組件中。Put your derived class in the assembly with your application to install. - 叫用安裝程式。Invoke the installers. 例如，使用 InstallUtil.exe 來叫用安裝程式。For example, use the InstallUtil.exe to invoke the installers. 屬性包含的安裝程式集合。The property contains a collection of installers. 如果這個執行個體是安裝程式集合的一部分屬性設定為包含集合的執行個體。If this instance of is part of an installer collection, the property is set to the instance that contains the collection. 如需使用的範例集合，請參閱類別。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. ， ， ，以及方法類別瀏覽儲存在安裝程式集合屬性，並叫用每個安裝程式的對應方法。The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers stored in the property, and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. ， ， ，以及方法都不一定會呼叫在同一個執行個體。The , , , and methods are not always called on the same instance. 例如，一個可能會同時安裝，並認可應用程式時，使用執行個體，然後釋出該執行個體的參考。For example, one instance might be used while installing and committing an application, and then the reference to that instance is released. 更新版本中，解除安裝應用程式會建立新的參照執行個體，表示方法會呼叫另一個執行個體。Later, uninstalling the application creates a reference to a new instance, meaning that the method is called by a different instance of . 基於這個理由，在衍生類別中，儲存在安裝程式中的電腦的狀態。For this reason, in your derived class, do not save the state of a computer in an installer. 請改用，會保留在呼叫之間，並傳入您， ， ，和方法。Instead, use an that is preserved across calls and passed into your , , , and methods. 兩種情況下說明需要將資訊儲存在狀態的好幫手。Two situations illustrate the need to save information in the state-saver . 首先，假設您的安裝程式設定的登錄機碼。First, suppose that your installer sets a registry key. 它應該儲存的索引鍵中的原始值。It should save the key's original value in the . 如果回復安裝，就可以還原為原始值。If the installation is rolled back, the original value can be restored. 其次，假設安裝程式會取代現有的檔案。Second, suppose the installer replaces an existing file. 將現有的檔案儲存在暫存目錄和檔案中的新位置的位置。Save the existing file in a temporary directory and the location of the new location of the file in the . 如果回復安裝，較新的檔案會在刪除或取代原始從暫存位置。If the installation is rolled back, the newer file is deleted and replaced by the original from the temporary location. 屬性包含安裝的相關資訊。The property contains information about the installation. 例如，進行安裝，也就是要儲存所需的資訊之檔案的位置記錄檔的位置相關的資訊方法，並安裝可執行檔執行時所輸入的命令列。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別。The following example demonstrates the use of the class. 它會建立類別繼承自。It creates a class which inherits from . 當即將完成，就會發生事件，並顯示訊息。When is about to complete, event occurs and a message is displayed. 若要使用類別，您必須參考**System.Configuration.Install**專案中的組件。To use the class, you must reference the **System.Configuration.Install** assembly in your project. [!code-cpp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CPP/installer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CS/installer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/VB/installer.vb#1)]

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, completes the install transaction.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範方法的類別。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 類別衍生自基底類別和方法會覆寫。A class is derived from the base class and the method are overridden. [!code-cpp[Installer_Install#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Install/CPP/installer_install.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Install#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Install/CS/installer_install.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Installer_Install#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Install/VB/installer_install.vb#2)]

exception.span: 的儲存狀態可能已經損毀。

span.span: The saved-state might have been corrupted.

exception.span: 在安裝的 階段時發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred during the phase of the installation.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況會被忽略，安裝會繼續進行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the installation continues.

exception.span: 不過，安裝完成之後，應用程式可能無法正常運作。

span.span: However, the application might not function correctly after the installation is complete.

span.para: 如果您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法衍生方法中的第一次。方法呼叫只有當方法的這個執行個體中的每個安裝程式成功。方法將儲存在執行正確的解除安裝，並呼叫所需的資訊方法的集合中的每個安裝程式。

If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. The method is called only if the method of each installer in this instance's succeeds. The method stores information needed to do a correct uninstallation, and calls the method of each installer in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ Context { System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定有關目前安裝的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the current installation.
An that contains information about the current installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含安裝資訊。The property contains installation information. 例如，進行安裝，也就是要儲存所需的資訊之檔案的位置記錄檔的位置相關的資訊方法，並安裝可執行檔執行時所輸入的命令列。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 程式會呼叫， ， ，或方法集屬性與方法所需的資訊。The program that calls the , , , or methods sets the property with information that the methods need. 如果安裝程式屬於安裝程式集合時，父安裝程式會設定之前呼叫任何一種方法的屬性。If an installer belongs to an installer collection, the parent installer sets the property before calling any of these methods. 您可以透過父安裝程式屬性。The parent installer can be accessed through the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範屬性類別。The following example demonstrates the property of the class. 內容屬性包含記錄檔的位置進行安裝，也就是要儲存所需的資訊之檔案的位置資訊方法，並已在命令列輸入時安裝執行可執行檔。The contents of the property contain information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 這些內容隨即顯示在主控台上。These contents are then displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CPP/installer_context.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CS/installer_context.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/VB/installer_context.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得安裝程式集合中所有安裝程式的說明文字。

span.span: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.

value.span: 安裝程式集合中所有安裝程式的說明文字，包括每個安裝程式執行動作的描述，以及可以傳遞給每個安裝程式且每個安裝程式都可了解的安裝可執行檔 (例如，InstallUtil.exe 公用程式) 的命令列選項。

span.span: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what the installer does and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the InstallUtil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by this installer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此屬性定義於類別，而呼叫時，會傳回描述和可執行檔，例如 Installutil.exe 公用程式，可傳遞至和了解安裝的命令列選項.This property is defined in the class, which, when called, returns the description of the and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the Installutil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by the . [!code-cpp[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/CPP/installer_helptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/CS/installer_helptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/VB/installer_helptext.vb#1)]

exception.span: 安裝程式集合中的安裝程式之一指定 null 參考而不是說明文字。

span.span: One of the installers in the installer collection specifies a null reference instead of help text.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況可能原因是已定義包含說明文字的欄位，但未將其初始化。

span.span: A likely cause for this exception is that a field to contain the help text is defined but not initialized.

exception.span: 在集合中有一個安裝程式的 事件處理常式發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred in the event handler of one of the installers in the collection.

span.para: -如果您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法衍生方法中的第一次。方法呼叫方法中所包含的每個安裝程式這個執行個體的屬性。包含安裝程式執行之後，這個方法會更新物件 (透過指定參數) 以反映安裝的狀態。應為空白時傳遞至方法。如果要將所有方法成功，呼叫方法。否則，呼叫方法。 -如果您要新增至安裝程式執行個體中的集合方法，請務必執行同一個新增至集合中的項目方法。不過，您可以避免維護這兩種方法中的集合，如果您加入到安裝程式執行個體類別建構函式中的自訂安裝程式的集合。

- If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance. After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation. The should be empty when passed to the method. If all the methods succeed, the method is called. Otherwise, the method is called. - If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含安裝程式安裝所需由這個物件的集合才能正確安裝元件的執行個體。The property contains a collection of installers that install objects needed by this instance to correctly install the component. ， ， ，以及方法類別瀏覽的安裝程式集合，並叫用每個安裝程式的對應方法。The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. 如果這個執行個體中的安裝程式集合，包含屬性是包含集合的執行個體。If this instance of is contained in an installer collection, the property is the instance that contains the collection. 如需使用的範例集合，請參閱類別。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範和屬性。The following example demonstrates the and properties. 屬性會顯示聯。The property shows the associated with an . span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範方法的。The following example demonstrates the method of . 的衍生類別中覆寫方法。The method is overridden in the derived class of . 若要強制安裝復原會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated to force an installation rollback. [!code-cpp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CPP/installer_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CS/installer_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/VB/installer_rollback.vb#1)]

exception.span: 參數為 。

span.span: The parameter is .
-or-

exception.span: 的儲存狀態可能已經損毀。

span.span: The saved-state might have been corrupted.

exception.span: 在安裝的 階段時發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred during the phase of the installation.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況會被忽略，復原會繼續進行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the rollback continues.

exception.span: 不過，復原完成之後，電腦可能無法完全還原至其初始狀態。

span.span: However, the computer might not be fully reverted to its initial state after the rollback completes.

span.para: 當您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法衍生方法中的第一次。復原作業會將電腦還原到之前安裝發生的狀態。會呼叫方法方法，這個執行個體，或安裝程式集合中的任何安裝程式無法正確運作。藉由呼叫所產生的任何例外狀況的安裝程式集合中的安裝程式的方法則會忽略並繼續執行其他的安裝程式復原。

When you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. A rollback operation restores the computer to the state it was in before the installations occurred. The method is called if the method of this instance of , or any installer in the installer collection, fail to run correctly. Any exceptions generated by calling the methods of the installers in the installer collection are ignored and the rollback of the other installers continues.

[!code-cpp[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/CPP/installer_uninstall.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/CS/installer_uninstall.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/VB/installer_uninstall.vb#1)]

exception.span: 的儲存狀態可能已經損毀。

span.span: The saved-state might have been corrupted.

exception.span: 解除安裝時發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred while uninstalling.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況會被忽略，解除安裝會繼續進行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.

exception.span: 不過，解除安裝完成之後，應用程式可能沒有完全解除安裝。

span.span: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstallation completes.

span.para: -如果您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法衍生方法中的第一次。方法呼叫方法中所包含的每個安裝程式這個執行個體的屬性。包含安裝程式執行之後，這個方法會更新物件 (透過指定參數) 以反映安裝的狀態。應為空白時傳遞至方法。如果要將所有方法成功，呼叫方法。否則，呼叫方法。 -如果您要新增至安裝程式執行個體中的集合方法，請務必執行同一個新增至集合中的項目方法。不過，您可以避免維護這兩種方法中的集合，如果您加入到安裝程式執行個體類別建構函式中的自訂安裝程式的集合。

- If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance. After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation. The should be empty when passed to the method. If all the methods succeed, the method is called. Otherwise, the method is called. - If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.
